posts.title: The Algorithm Ate My Personality
posts.author: @deja.blu
posts.content: I opened TikTok for '5 minutes' and now it's been 3 hours and I want to buy mushroom lamps. Is this self-expression or just curated chaos?

posts.title: Soft Launching My Life
posts.author: @sofia.exe
posts.content: Posted a blurry pic of my hand near a window. No context. Just vibes. Let them wonder.

posts.title: Digital Burnout Is Real
posts.author: @pixel.mood
posts.content: I've got 14 unread messages, 6 open tabs, and the energy of a houseplant. If you see me, pretend I'm on DND IRL.

posts.title: Main Character Syndrome Activated
posts.author: @mochi.mel
posts.content: Walked into a coffee shop during golden hour with earbuds in and Lana playing. Felt dramatic. Spilled my drink. Core memory made.

posts.title: Can’t Tell If I’m Tired or Existential
posts.author: @cloud.based
posts.content: Slept 9 hours, still emotionally buffering. But at least my Spotify Discover playlist understands me.
